sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_78d5a953ccade5107f446723b89ae54b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description>Add a refresh date to CMDB records</description><name>Populate Refresh Date</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[//u_refresh_dateISEMPTY
var yearsToAdd = 1;

var rec = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_computer');
rec.addEncodedQuery('u_refresh_dateISEMPTY');
rec.setLimit(10);
rec.query();
while (rec.next()) {
    var installDate = new GlideDateTime(rec.install_date);

    if (rec.manufacturer.getDisplayValue() == 'Apple') {
        yearsToAdd = 2;
    } else if (rec.manufacturer.getDisplayValue() == 'Lenovo') {
        yearsToAdd = 3;
    } else {
        yearsToAdd = 4;
    }

    installDate.addYears(yearsToAdd);
    rec.u_refresh_date = installDate.getDisplayValue();''
//    rec.update();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-18 11:26:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>78d5a953ccade5107f446723b89ae54b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Populate Refresh Date</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_78d5a953ccade5107f446723b89ae54b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-18 11:32:59</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
